item.description: Romp around the Beantown Playground, full of unique climbing structures and slides paying tribute to Boston. Pass under an arch to the 'Public Garden' complete with brightly colored child-sized duckies to sit on. Climb stairs to the mini Green Monster at Fenway, or climb up to a tree house. Pretend to have a picnic underneath (no food allowed). Play pirate on a wooden pirate ship.
item.name: Kids AM Activity: Beantown Indoor Playground
